definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: But it's completely different, the moment of inertia, if you rotated it about this axis.
sentences.chinese: 但它完全不同，转动惯量，如果将其绕这轴旋转。

sentences.english: Almost all moment of inertia is in this system.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有这个系统中的转动惯量。

sentences.english: So we know the moment of inertia.
the curl of a force field measures the torque per unit moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 力场的旋度是，描述扭转力矩与转动惯量比值的量。

sentences.english: You get a totally different moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 你会得到完全不同的转动惯量。

sentences.english: What is the moment of inertia of that?
sentences.chinese: 它的转动惯量是多少呢？

sentences.english: Don't worry about moments of inertia about an arbitrary line.
sentences.chinese: 不需要对任意曲线，都找出它的转动惯量。

sentences.english: I have four objects here, and they all have different moments of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我这里有四个物体，它们的转动惯量也不同。

sentences.english: For the moment of inertia, we want the square of a distance to the axis of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 至于转动惯量，要求的其实是到旋转轴距离的平方。

sentences.english: That is how we define moment of inertia.
sentences.chinese: 这就是转动惯量的定义方法。

sentences.english: Well, we will try to compute now the moment of inertia about this point.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去计算关于这个点的转动惯量。

sentences.english: You can calculate the moment of inertia.
The application of a single-chip processor aided three wire pendulum experiment;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种嵌入式三线摆转动惯量测量系统。

sentences.english: What now is the moment of inertia?
It is slightly strange but I have y in inertia about the x-axis.
sentences.chinese: 这有点奇怪，关于x轴的转动惯量跟y有关。

sentences.english: This is the radius of the earth, and you see the moment of inertia of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 这是地球的半径，得到地球的转动惯量。

definition: lever arm (i.e. perpendicular distance from the fulcrum to the line of force)
